channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 18:17 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 18:17 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
